original_text: John told them, ‘You must take the right amount of money from people. You must not take more money than the rules say you should take.’
korean_text: 이르되 부과된 것 외에는 거두지 말라 하고

sentences.original_text: 'You must take the right amount of money from people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 사람들에게서 올바른 양의 돈을 받아야 한다

sentences.original_text: You must not take more money
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 더 많은 돈을 받아서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: than the rules say you should take.'
